text: nætahot (movungē upamāva) ghana andhakārayenda, gigirumenda, viduliyenda yut valākuḷen vasina varṣāvaṭa hasu vuṇu (ayagē upamāvaṭa sama vannēya. esē hasu vuṇu) movun, heṇa han̆ḍin maraṇa biyaṭa patva, tamangē atæn̆gili tamangē kaṇvalaṭa ætuḷu kara (tada kara, vasā) gannāha. namut allāh, pratikṣēpa karana movunva (sǣma viṭama) vaṭakara genama siṭinnēya
